item.title: .NET Framework Migration to .NET9
item.description: Have a large .NET Framework codebase that you want to migrate to .NET8 or beyond? Here’s some tips of my .NET Framework migration and things to consider. YouTube Check out my YouTube channel, where I post all kinds of content accompanying my posts, including this video showing everything in this post. Introduction to the Migration Journey My… Read More ».NET Framework Migration to .NET9 The post .NET Framework Migration to .
